participant_1.background:
I drive a four wheel drive vehicle.
I wear a uniform to work.
My favorite color is blue.
I like to draw and paint in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I grow the tallest sunflowers you have ever seen.
My husband and i have a suicide pact.
I love agatha christie novels.
I spend most of my days working at my churchs food pantry.
I have 5 children , though 2 have passed away.

content.text: I'm a big fan of Agatha Christie novels. I've read them all.
Really? That's awesome! I love Agatha Christie too. She's my favorite author.
I love her mysteries. They're so clever and well-written.
Me too. I love trying to figure out who the killer is before the end.
Me too. It's so much fun.
Do you have a favorite Agatha Christie novel?
It's hard to say. I love them all. But I think my favorite is Death on the Nile.
That's a great one. I love that one too.
I love the setting in Egypt. It's so exotic.
Me too. And I love the characters. They're all so interesting.
I agree. They're all so well-developed.
Yeah. Agatha Christie was a master at creating characters.
I'm so glad you're a fan of Agatha Christie. It's always nice to meet someone who loves her books as much as I do.
